descriptions.README.md: Project overview, quick start guide, and script reference. Start here for a high-level introduction to all available features and commands.
descriptions.GETTING_STARTED.md: Comprehensive step-by-step guide for new users. Covers installation, configuration, automation setup, best practices, and troubleshooting.
descriptions.config.example.json: Centralized configuration file for all scripts. Customize WiFi networks, email settings, backup locations, notification preferences, and scheduling options.
descriptions.validate-setup.ps1: Validation tool that checks all scripts, configuration files, system requirements, and Chocolatey installation. Run this first to ensure everything is ready.
descriptions.install-chocolatey.ps1: Installs Chocolatey package manager with proper configuration and health checks. Essential first step for Windows package management.
descriptions.install-essential-apps.ps1: Batch installer for essential Windows applications using Chocolatey. Installs browsers, development tools, utilities, and more automatically.
descriptions.auto-update-chocolatey.ps1: Automatically updates Chocolatey and packages when connected to specific WiFi and on power. Includes smart scheduling and safety checks.
descriptions.cleanup-chocolatey.ps1: Comprehensive Chocolatey maintenance script. Removes old package versions, clears caches, and optimizes disk usage.
descriptions.health-check.ps1: Comprehensive diagnostics tool. Checks installation health, system requirements, outdated packages, disk usage, and configuration issues.
descriptions.backup-packages.ps1: Backup and restore your Chocolatey package list. Perfect for migrating to new machines or disaster recovery scenarios.
descriptions.setup-scheduled-tasks.ps1: Interactive wizard to create Windows scheduled tasks for automated updates and maintenance. Set custom schedules easily.
descriptions.Send-ToastNotification.ps1: Helper script for sending modern Windows 10/11 Toast notifications. Used by other scripts for user notifications.
descriptions.powershell-scripting-tutorial.md: Learn PowerShell scripting using real examples from these scripts. Covers functions, error handling, logging, system detection, and more.
descriptions.safety-and-best-practices.md: Important safety information, pre-installation checklist, emergency procedures, and security considerations for running automation scripts.
descriptions.CHANGELOG.md: Version history with new features, improvements, and bug fixes for each release.
